channel.title: Authors on Wu Ai's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Wu Ai's Homepage

item.description:
Wu Ai is an Associate Professor at the College of Science, Guilin University of Technology. His research interests include distributed optimization, distributed machine learning, multi-agent systems, and artificial intelligence.

He received the BSc degree in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics from Hubei University of Nationalities in 2005, the M.Sc. degree in Computational Mathematics from Huazhong University of Science and Technology in 2007, and the Ph.D. Degree in Applied Mathematics at the School of Mathematics and Statistics, Xidian University in 2017. From September 2018 to September 2019, he is a visiting Honorary Associate with the La Trobe University, Australia.

For prospective graduate students, please contact him by email with your resume.
